dc_title_s: A new map of South America, from the latest authorities
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures.; Probably plate no. 32 from Carey's general atlas, 1814.; Prime meridians: London and Philadelphia.; Borders outlined in color.; Imprint from dealer's note pencilled on verso.; "32" pencilled on map.|52 x 40 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:14,700,000|General Map Collection
